page.title: 08 Transport
page.content: Wickford is served by a variety of different forms of transport. The bus service is provided by the Eastern National Bus Company. The routes run to Southend, Basildon and Billericay. There is also a service to Wood Green in London. The most commonly used form of transport is the railway. It is used mainly by commuters who travel to London to work.At Wickford it is possible to change to the branch line that runs to Woodham Ferrers and on to Southminster. Wickford has four different taxi services. They provide a door to door service.
